title: Definitions
context: [ยง46-122] Definitions. The following terms when used in this chapter shall have the following respective meanings: &ldquo;County executive agency&rdquo; means any department, office, board, or commission of a county. &ldquo;County legislative body&rdquo; means the city council or county council of a county. &ldquo;Person&rdquo; means an individual, group, partnership, firm, association, corporation, trust, governmental agency, governmental official, administrative body, or tribunal or any form of business or legal entity. &ldquo;Principal&rdquo; means a person who has entered into a development agreement pursuant to the procedures specified in this chapter, including a successor in interest. [L 1985, c 48, pt of ยง1] Revision Note Definitions rearranged.
